page.title: 09RELIGION STRACATHRO
page.content:
The{Parish Church of Stracathro}was rebuilt in 1884 in memory of one of the Campbell family of Stracathro House and has some lovely stained glass windows and memorial furniture gifted by local families.
The{parish of Stracathro}is now {linked with a church in Brechin}and the{Minister of the linkage has his {Manse in that city.
{The former Manse of Stracathro}with its grounds, is now{privately owned.
There is{another Church of Scotland {charge}in our area.{The Stracathro {Hospital Chapel}is used as a place of worship every week and members and patients of the Hospital are{served by the{Minister of}another parish in Angus,{Farnell.
